channel.title: Need help with coding..... Never changes ingame
channel.description: I've tried to code so many things in my server but like only 20% of it actually changes. This is very frusterating and I was wondering what I am doing wrong.... Please help :(

item.title: Need help with coding..... Never changes ingame
item.dc:creator: @patargangstar patargangstar
item.description:
@patargangstar wrote:

[quote=“Marine5287, post:5, topic:397626”][quote author=I InDrEk I link=topic=494765.msg3617436#msg3617436 date=1307105910]

I’m sorta new to this so I’m not quite sure what that is… But I have tried to open the “compiler” and it always says “The system cannot find the path specified, press any key to continue” then i’ll press a key and it closes out, Can you explain what I’m doing wrong?
[/quote]You need to set your java path. And make sure you have jdk.

DON’T set your Java Path, it will create the most annoying error for you. All you have to do is go to

http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html and download this JDK:

jdk.png1023×575

[size=14pt]Now go to Java.com and just click “Free Java Download”:[/size]

java.png1023×575

[size=14pt]Now go right click your compiler>edit, erase everything, and put this code into there:[/size]

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Now you should be able to compile your server, which allows you to change anything to want.[/quote]

LOL? i never update my jdk i just always change the version set in the compiler and it works fine

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with coding..... Never changes ingame

item.title: Need help with coding..... Never changes ingame
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

[quote=“I InDrEk I, post:3, topic:397626”][quote author=jakerc1 link=topic=494765.msg3617220#msg3617220 date=1307076170]
I’m sorta new to this so I’m not quite sure what that is… But I have tried to open the “compiler” and it always says “The system cannot find the path specified, press any key to continue” then i’ll press a key and it closes out, Can you explain what I’m doing wrong?
[/quote]You need to set your java path. And make sure you have jdk.[/quote]

DON’T set your Java Path, it will create the most annoying error for you. All you have to do is go to

http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html and download this JDK:

jdk.png1023×575

[size=14pt]Now go to Java.com and just click “Free Java Download”:[/size]

java.png1023×575

[size=14pt]Now go right click your compiler>edit, erase everything, and put this code into there:[/size]

@echo off Title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

Now you should be able to compile your server, which allows you to change anything to want.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with coding..... Never changes ingame

item.description:
@alexisdabomb wrote:

Ok go to computer then c: then Program files then java and it will say which version of JDK u have then go to ur compiles itl say something like JDK 1.6.0 or something then just
Add in your JDK version.make
Sure u got JDK dled though
